mapper.select: SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'KW_GRP_CO_CD', B.KW_GRP_CO_CD) AS KW_GRP_CO_CD_NM /*교원 그룹 회사 코드명*/ , B.CNTR_NO AS RVE_AK_NO /*계약번호*/ , B.CNTR_SN AS RVE_AK_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , ( SELECT F2.FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD F2 WHERE F2.FNIT_DV_CD = '1' AND F2.FNIT_CD = A.VAC_BNK_CD) AS VAC_BNK_NM /*은행명*/ , A.VAC_NO /*가상계좌번호*/ , A.VAC_ACOWN_NM AS VAC_DPR_NM /*입금자명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_TP_DTL_CD', E.PD_TP_DTL_CD) AS EDI_PD_DV_CD_NM /*EDI 상품구분코드명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', C.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD_NM /*구분(할부/렌탈/멤버십/회사/정기배송/필터)*/ FROM TB_RVDW_VAC_IS_IZ A /*가상계좌발급내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_RVDW_VAC_IS_DTL B /*가상계좌발급상세*/ ON B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.KW_GRP_CO_CD = A.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND B.VAC_IS_ID = A.VAC_IS_ID INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C /*계약상세*/ ON C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND C.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS E /*상품기본*/ ON E.PD_CD = B.PD_CD WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.VAC_NO = #{vacNo} AND B.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND B.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
